import React,{useState} from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import $ from 'jquery'; import ActivityLoader from 'react-loader-spinner'; import Loader from '../Loader/loader'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; import InputBox from '../InputComponent/InputComponent'; import {Dropdown} from 'primereact/dropdown'; import MultiSelect from '../multiselect.js' import DropDown from '../dropdown.js' const modalRoot=document.getElementById('portal_modal'); const Modal =(props)=>{ const [joining_date,change_joining_date]=useState(new Date()); const [releaving_date,change_releaving_date]=useState(); const [rolesSelect,changeRolesSelect]=useState([]) const [channelsSelect,changeChannelsSelect]=useState([]); const [employeeSelect,changeEmployeeSelect]=useState(null); const {portalData}=props; return ReactDOM.createPortal(
